pageProps.content:
Welcome to my tech guides. This is a place I created to share information I've gathered that I thought might be helpful to others.


One of the things I enjoy most is building things of value. Towards that end, technology provides the ability to deliver value at a low-cost to a wide audience. It covers my current technology focus, which is on mobile and web applications built using the React framework.

It ended up being that and more.
